description: The Eide Bailly LLP Scholarship is open to a declared Accounting major with a minimum 3.5 cumulative GPA. The student must have completed a minimum of 45 hours of credit at the time of application. This scholarship may only be used for tuition, books and fees. Eligibility Requirements Declared Accounting major Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher Completed 45+ hours Award Requirements This scholarship may only be used for tuition, books and fees.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting
